title: Landing page project
description:
Responsive landing page project for a fictional company based on a challenge by frontendmentor.io.

The site is responsive for all commonly used screen sizes and also includes custom hover states for interactive elements.

title: Nasa model viewer
description:
Website with 3D models sourced from the official NASA repository.

It's a proof of concept that was later developed into the Cosmic project. It focused on sharing 3D models on the web using my own solution. The viewer was made in Three.js and it was bundled with Vite.

title: JS Tabs
description:
My first Single Page Application made as a University exercise.

It consists of some interactive tools that gave me training in basic JavaScript coding.

title: Launch countdown timer
description:
Countdown timer project based on a challenge by frontendmentor.io.

The project is displaying a fully animated live countdown timer that ticks down every second to a specific time.
